description:
Rinne and the other Shinigami are tasked with cleaning the Wheel of Reincarnation. The dangerous work only gets worse when a brawl breaks out, and Damashigami enter the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le nettoyage de la roue de la réincarnation – Une rancœur sans limites – Un chiot sous la pluie
Rinne no Wa: Issei Seisou / Urami Mugendai / Ame no Naka no Koinu
Wheel of Reincarnation Cleanup Day / Infinite Malice / A Puppy in the Rain
輪廻の輪 一斉清掃 / 恨み無限大 / 雨の中の子犬
